text: Engen Botswana Limited is a downstream petroleum company. Engen's principal activity includes petrochemical investments and property operations. They market through a retail network. ==Board of directors== The current board of directors includes: * Dr S Ndzinge-Chairman * AM Bryce * C Monga-Managing Director * A Siwawa * F Kotze * V Bvumbi * R. Mathews * C. Mareka ==References== ==External links== * Company Website * Botswana Stock Exchange *https://www.mmegi.bw/index.php?sid=4&aid;=7&dir;=2008/June/Thursday12/ Category:Oil companies of Botswana Category:Companies listed on the Botswana Stock Exchange
title: Engen Botswana Limited
